title: Mathematics Curriculum Utilizing Functional Analysis Diagrams (FAD) for Engineering Systems Understanding

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic arithmetic operations and simple equations, foundational interest in engineering problem-solving
context.additional_context: Utilization of smartphone-based learning tools, combined with offline workshops and online assignments.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze engineering system components with 80% accuracy using Functional Analysis Diagrams (FAD).
Learners can improve mathematical modeling skills by 70% when solving real technical problems using the FAD model.
Without English-written technical materials, learners can improve understanding of engineering concepts by 60% using FAD-based visual tools.

resources: Offline Workbooks and Visual Learning Materials
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
